column4: is anyone using a nvidia card here on dapper? specifically a geforce fx 5200... i have some questions
i am, but it's not like i actually use the 3D
can you tell me what you did to install it properly, im not sure what i did wrong... my highest resolution offered is 1024x768

i just did "sudo aptitude install nvidia-glx", then "sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg" and set it up to use then "nvidia" driver rather than "nv", then went through all the questions, then choose my resolutions and refreshrates
